name: Hostile Takeover
description: You made it to the relative safety of an apparently quiet abandoned office tower. You tried to reach the higher floors but an ID card reader is on your way. After a sleeping on a swivel chair, you woke up to screams all around.

name: Challenge-Vault Newcomer
description: You were very important to an influential corporation with ties to the government, earning you a place in a self-sufficient Vault should the worst happen. You arrived later than most who knew of it. Something seems very, very wrong.
